name: Axie Creator
description:
AXIE CREATOR (based on the same lovable pets from Axie Infinity)

CREATE YOUR OWN LOVABLE AXIE ARMY TODAY!

Axie Creator is a 2D pet creation simulator that explores the potential of an NFT video game project of the same universe – Axie Infinity by Sky Mavis. Our team’s project aims to visualize an alternative idle game extension to the existing turn based PvP game with an added layer of interaction inspired by Kleptocats and Tamagotchi, which makes pet customization engaging in design where, unlike Axie Infinity which rewards cryptocurrency through ranked battles, players can also accumulate digital coins from the Ethereum blockchain through pet care and customization with scalable considerations for breeding and trading gameplay mechanics.

Controls:
Use Left mouse click to interact with the environment to collect Love Potions
Use WASD to navigate the Pet Customization panel
